snippet: Mr. Levy, who was one of Eric T. Schneiderman’s first hires, is returning to the litigation firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner.
abstract: Harlan Levy, chief deputy attorney general and counsel to New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman, is leaving state government to rejoin law firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Levy, who was one of Eric T. Schneiderman’s first hires, is returning to the litigation firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner.

headline.main: Harlan Levy, Schneiderman Deputy, Is Leaving Attorney General’s Office
headline.print_headline: Top Deputy to Exit New York Attorney General’s Office to Rejoin Law Firm
